content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that requires:
  - 9 iron plates
  - 5 iron gear wheels
  - 3 electronic circuits

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron plates are needed to craft iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when attempting to craft without a crafting machine
- Verify that you are using a crafting machine or furnace for recipes that require them.
